alert.note: Alert for Bernalillo; Cibola; San Miguel; Sandoval; Santa Fe; Socorro; Torrance; Valencia (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued April 22 at 4:45PM MDT until April 22 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Southeastern Cibola County in west central New Mexico... Southwestern San Miguel County in northeastern New Mexico... Valencia County in central New Mexico... Southeastern Sandoval County in north central New Mexico... Southern Santa Fe County in north central New Mexico... Northwestern Socorro County in central New Mexico... Bernalillo County in central New Mexico... Central Torrance County in central New Mexico... * Until 645 PM MDT. * At 443 PM MDT, a large area of dust persist across much of central New Mexico, including the Albuquerque Metro area eastward to Moriarty, Estancia and Clines Corners. HAZARD...Less than two miles visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Satellite imagery and surface observations. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 122 and 230. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 175 and 248, and between Mile Markers 312 and 338. Highway 285 between Mile Markers 235 and 281. Highway 550 between Mile Markers 1 and 10. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 171 and 184, between Mile Markers 189 and 191, and between Mile Markers 193 and 242. Locations impacted include... Albuquerque, Rio Rancho, Valencia, Los Lunas, Corrales, Bernalillo, Belen, Los Ranchos De Albuquerque, Bosque Farms and Edgewood. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust can be unhealthy and has been known to lead to Valley Fever. Avoid outdoor exposure. Blowing dust creates reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

area.areaDesc: Bernalillo; Cibola; San Miguel; Sandoval; Santa Fe; Socorro; Torrance; Valencia
